versiculos.texto: Merikitsi, meripaiti 'itsikate mete'aitakaku miki kwieyaritsie, haakaxa kaniutaweni. Xewiti tewi Wereni kiekame Kura kwieyaritsie heyeyaka Muhawi kwieyaritsie peta'a, yi'iya meta yuniwema yuhutame warawititi. [cite: 2993]

Miki 'uki 'Erimereki pititewakai, 'iyayata Nuhemi pititewakai, niwemamata Makiruni meta Kirihuni. [cite: 2994] Miki yunaiti 'Epirata kiekari mepihikitikai, Wereni kiekatari Kura kwieyaritsie. Kepauka Muhawi kwieyaritsie memeta'axia, mana mepiyuhayewaxi. [cite: 2995]
Matsi 'Erimereki kaniumini Nuhemi kinaya. Hiki miki yuxaita kaniuyuhayewa yuniwema yuhutame wahamatia. [cite: 2996]
Miki yuhutati mekaniutineneike 'ukarawetsixi muhawitsixi mekaniwarutiwitini. Xewiti 'Uripa pititewakai, xewitita Xuti. Tamamata wiyari mana metiteti, [cite: 2997]
hiki mikita mekaniukwini Makiruni meta Kirihuni. Nuhemi wiuratiti yuxaita puyuhayewaxi niwemama me'ukwiku. [cite: 2998]
Hiki Yawé yuteiterima hekwameki kaniwaparewiekaitini tixuaweriyati 'ikwaite. Hiki Nuhemi mipai retimaika kaniyukuha'aritiani yumu'e'ema waranuwitinike Muhawi yeyanike. [cite: 3000]
Hiki kaneyani yumu'e'ema yuhutame warawititi hakewa meripaiti mekienatikai. [cite: 3001] Yunaiti mekanekine huyeta, Kura kwieyaritsie haneme 'utia. [cite: 3007, 3008]

Hiki Nuhemi mipai katiniwarutahiawe yumu'e'ema: [cite: 3009] -Neuxei, yuxexuiti yukie xekeneutayeixia yumaamama wahetsia. [cite: 3010] Yawé 'aixia ketixexeiyani kexemitewanaki'eriekai memukwi, wahetsie kexemitewiyakai, yaxeikiata kexeminetenaki'eriekai ne. [cite: 3011]
Yawé waikawa kexeheparewieka hekwameki 'aixia 'anemeki xemitiwikieniki. [cite: 3012] Hiki kaniwaruti'itseni. Perutsi mu'e'emama kwinimieme meyuhiwerieti meputitsuanakai [cite: 3013]
mipai me'utiyuati: [cite: 3013] -Hawaiki. Tame tepiyehu 'ahamatia 'akiekaritsie. [cite: 3014]
Nuhemi mipai katiniwaruta'eiya: [cite: 3015] -Neuxei neniwema, yukie xekenehu. ¿Titayarikuta nehamatia xetekiniku? Tawariri nepikatiniweni memixetiwitiniki. [cite: 3016]
Xekenehu yukie, neniwema. Xekeneuhuni. Neri nepi'ukaratsi nepitseiye, tawariri nepikayiwe nemitiwikieniki. [cite: 3017] Xika neyiwenike, 'iki tikaritsie nepitiwikienikeyu nemitiniweniki, [cite: 3018]

¿xemeta xeteyiwawe xemiwakwewieniki mewawerekaku? ¿Xeteyuwairiya xekawikieti xemiyuhayewaniki wakimana? Hawaiki, neniwema. [cite: 3018] Waikawa matsi ne nepitiuka'eniwa kexeme. Yawé waikawa pinetsi'anayewaya. [cite: 3019]
Tawarita matsi karima mekaniutihiwakaitini, kwi meyuheiwerieti. Hiki 'Uripa yumu'e kaniutateutiani 'i'itseka. Peru Xuti hamatiana puyuhayewaxi. [cite: 3020, 3021]
Nuhemi mipai kaniutayini: [cite: 3022] -Neuxei, nemu'e. 'Awixi yukie petia, yukakaiyarixi wahetsia. 'Ekita hepaina kenemie. [cite: 3027, 3028]

Xuti mipai katinita'eiya: [cite: 3029] -Pepikanetsini'aka nemiyemieki, 'axaita nemimatsiku'eirieniki. [cite: 3030, 3031, 3032] »Ne 'ahamatia nepiyemie, hakewa pemetia. [cite: 3033] Hakewa pemekani, neta mana nepekani. [cite: 3034] 'Ateiterima, neteiterima mepihikitini. [cite: 3035] 'Akakaiyari pinekakaiyaritini. [cite: 3036]

Hakewa pememini, manata ne nepemini, [cite: 3037] Mana nepekateukieni. [cite: 3038] Yawé kenetsihe'uximatiani xika nemetsiku'eirieni yuheyemeki xika tixaiti kataretaxiriexiani, kaminitStateki [cite: 3039, 3041, 3042, 3043, 3044, 3045] Nuhemi 'uyi'iwiyaka miyuwairiyakaiki Xuti 'enuweiyake, tawariri pika'ita'imaiyaxi. [cite: 3046]

Hiki, yuhutati 'ukarawetsixi mekanekine huyeta meheta'axianike Wereni paiti. [cite: 3047] Me'u'axiaku, waikawa niuki kaniutixuawere wahepaitsita, naitsarie kiekaritsie. [cite: 3047] 'Ukarawetsixi mipai mekateniyuku'iwawiyakaitini: [cite: 3048] -¿'Iki Nuhemi katihiki? [cite: 3048]
Nuhemi mipai katiniwarutahiawe: [cite: 3049] -Nuhemi xepikanete'uteriwani. [cite: 3050] Marara pitari xekeneteneuteriwani. Naimekimitirikaiye nehatsiwime pinetsi'ayeitia. [cite: 3051, 3052, 3053]

>>Kepauka nemetia yemeki nepiyiwekai, [cite: 3055] nepihinekai matsi Yawé pinetsihakunuitia nexaitame, naime netiunawairieka. [cite: 3056, 3061] Titayari Nuhemi xenete'uteriwani [cite: 3062] Yawé 'uximatiarika netsi'upitiaka, [cite: 3063] S temawierika pinetsi'unawairi Naimekimitirikaiye». [cite: 3064, 3065]
Mipai Nuhemi katininuani yukiekaritsie, Muhawi kwieyaritsie heyeyaka, yumu'e hawititi Xuti Muhawi tewiyari. Kepauka memu'axia Wereni, tsewara 'itsanariyari putsutiariekai. [cite: 3066]
Nuhemi kinaya 'iwaya yatewa 'apuyeikakai, [cite: 3069] Wuhutsi titewati, 'Erimereki 'iwayatiti. [cite: 3070] Miki waikawa pirexeiyakai, teiteri mepi'eniekai. [cite: 3071]

Hiki Xuti Muhawi tewiyari Nuhemi mipai katiniutahiawe: [cite: 3072, 3073] -Keneneupitia nemitipepenamieki mira'itsanatinetsie, meyukuhayeikawa xeime 'aixia tiuka'iyarime hetsia. [cite: 3074, 3075, 3076, 3077] Hiki mu'eya mipai katinita'eiya: [cite: 3078] -Kenemie, neniwe. [cite: 3079]

Hiki Xuti kaneyani tsewara 'imiariyari hekuteixike mira'itsanatinetsie, 'itsanamete wa'utima. 'Atsikatimaiti kemi'ane 'itsanaripa meuyenenikekai, Wuhutsi 'itsanaripa kaneuyeneni, 'Erimereki 'iwaya hetsia. [cite: 3080, 3081]

Hiki 'itsanamete mete'uximayakaku, kaninuani Wuhutsi Wereni reni heyeyaka, te'uximayatamete kaniwarutawairitiani: [cite: 3082] -Yawé xehamatia ke'uyeikani. [cite: 3087] Miki mipai mekatenita'eiya: [cite: 3087] -'Ekita, 'ahamatia ke'uyeikani. [cite: 3088]
Te'uximayatamete tiwa'aitiwame Wuhutsi mipai katiniuta'iwawiya: [cite: 3089, 3090] -¿Miki 'ukaratsi kepaiki pira'iya? [cite: 3091]
Miki mipai katinita'eiya: [cite: 3092] -'Iki 'ukaratsi, Muhawi tewiyari pihiki, Nuhemi hamatia meyetia. [cite: 3093]

Miki puyutawau kename neke'ipitiani xuruku 'utia, 'itsanamete mitikuteixiniki memikuhayeikawa. [cite: 3094, 3095, 3096] Ximeripaititi pikatitahayewawe 'amitinuatsie 'ena. [cite: 3097, 3098] Hikike kani'uxipieka 'etsiwa 'etipiwaritia. [cite: 3099, 3100]

Hiki Wuhutsi, Xuti mipai katiniutahiawe: [cite: 3101] -Neniwe keneneu'eni. Hipame wa'itsanaripa pepikatiteixineni. 'Ateewa paiti pepikaheyeikani. 'Ahepai 'ukarawetsixi wahamatia keneyuhayewani. [cite: 3101, 3102]

Kene'a'iwiya hakewa teme'uwa tema'itsanatiwetsie, [cite: 3104, 3105] 'a'iwama. [cite: 3106] nepitiwarahiawe keniwakuweiyaneni 'Itsanamete 'ukitsi mipai memikamatsi'uximatiakaki. [cite: 3107, 3108, 3109, 3110, 3111] Kepauka pemeuharimikini, hakewa haa meti'u, keneharimie, te'uximayatamete wahetsia. [cite: 3112]
Hiki Xuti 'utihiximakeka kwiepa, mipai kaniutayini: [cite: 3113, 3114] -Karitsi 'aixia pepinetimate penetsi'uxeiyaka, ne 'ateewa paiti nekiekametime. [cite: 3114]

Wuhutsi kanita'eiya: [cite: 3116] -Mipai nepitimarie, naime kepemitiuyuri 'amu'e hetsiemieme kepauka 'akina mumi, kepemitiwaruku'eiri 'apaapama, miki kwieyaritsie hakewa pemetinuiwaxi, hiki miki kiekariyaritsie peheyeyaka 'ena pepunua pekahemarieti. [cite: 3121]
Yawé kematiyetuirieka kepemitiuyuriki. Yawé, 'ixaheritsixi wakakaiyari, hetsia waikawa pekaninuani mimatsi'iwiyaniki, kematsiparewieka. [cite: 3122, 3123, 3124, 3125]

Mipai kaniutayini: [cite: 3126] -Xikatsi tiyiwenike nematsinaki'atsitiaka, neti'aitiwame. 'Eki pepinetsinitia, 'aixia penetixeiyati pepinetsikihiawe, tsepa nekamati'a'uximayatsiriwame. [cite: 3127, 3128, 3129, 3130, 3132]

Hiki Wuhutsi mipai katinitahiawe kepauka mitikwanikekai: [cite: 3133] -'Enapai kenayaka, kenayuka'ikwaitiaka tumati 'ipinariyariki 'apa kenekwaka. [cite: 3134] Kepauka Xuti te'uximayatamete wahamatia 'amutaya, Wuhutsi pitaxatia tsewara xarikiyari. Hiki miki katiniukwani, kaniutahuxani 'akuxita kaniuyuhayewa. [cite: 3135]

Kepauka miki manukuke reuteiximieka, miki te'i'uximayatsiriwamete mipai katiniwaruta'aitiani: [cite: 3136, 3137, 3138, 3139] -Kepauka 'iki xuruku 'utia mititeixineni, xepika'itewiyatsitiaka. [cite: 3140, 3141]
Matsi manahiatika xexuime xekenekuhayeikiriwani, para miki mikuteixiki, xepika'itate'ani. [cite: 3142, 3143, 3144, 3145, 3146]
Meriki Xuti tikuteixiti kaniukutaikaiyarieni. Hikita tsewara mikuteixixi kaniutikatse. Xeitewiyari kiruyari paimeme payexiri. [cite: 3150]
Hiki hetiti kaneyani kiekaritsie. Mu'eya kanixeiya kepaimeme matikikai. Xuti yumu'e katiniyetuirieni mitiuyuhayewakai mitiukwaitsie mieme 'utahuxaku. [cite: 3151]

Hiki mu'eya mipai katinita'iwawiya: [cite: 3152] -Hakewa hiki tsewara pepekuteixixi, hakewa pepireta'uximayataxi, 'aixia ke'itiarieka tewi 'aixia mimarexei. [cite: 3152] Hiki Xuti yumu'e katiniutaxatiani kemi'ane hetsia mireta'uximayataxi. Mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3153] -Tewi hetsia hiki nemireta'uximayataxi, Wuhutsi katinitewaka. [cite: 3153]

Nuhemi yumu'e mipai katiniutahiawe: [cite: 3154] -Yawé 'aixia keheiyurieka. Yawé pikatihayewa tahetsie tiwiyati yunaki'eriya tatsipitiati, memayeneniere wahetsiemieme meta memukwi. [cite: 3154] Miki tewi pita'iwa hurawa. Miki pihiritiarie mitatsiparewieniki. [cite: 3155]
Xuti Muhawi tewiyari mipai kaniutayini: [cite: 3156] -Mipaita pinerahiawekai, 'ena keneu'ahayewa nete'uximayatsiriwamete wahamatia, kepaukake 'itsanari naime temikinini. [cite: 3157]
Nuhemi mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3157] -Neniwe, matikunanake wahamatia pemuyeikaniki, para hipame xaitsie pemikatiware'uximayatsiriekaki. [cite: 3158]

'Ayumieme Xuti mana kaniuyuhayewa Wuhutsi te'uximayatsiriwametemama 'ukari wahetsia, mikuteixiniki kepaukake memikini [cite: 3158] me'itsanatiweti tsewara meta tiriku. Mexikuxi, yumu'e hetsia 'ukatei. [cite: 3163, 3164]

Merikitsi mu'eya Nuhemi mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3167] -Neuxei neniwe. [cite: 3168] Xiari peuyewetse nemimatsikuwawirieniki hakewa pemekani 'aixia 'anemeki tixaiti pekareuyehiati. [cite: 3169, 3170, 3171, 3172]
Matsiti Wuhutsi te'uximayatsiriwamete wahetsia pepeta'axe, miki pita'iwa. Miki, 'iki tikariyaritsie mana penuani tsewara matikatsiwatsie. [cite: 3173, 3174]

Keneti'iwa, witsimu'ia keneu'atawirieka meta 'akemari 'aixia mi'anene kenanakatixiaka. Kenemie tsewara matikatsiwatsie. [cite: 3175] Pepikaheyuhekiatani kapa mipai retimaniki, kepaukake miretahayewa rekwati meta re'ieti 'anake. [cite: 3176]
Kepaukari meyemie hekahunike, kene'a'iwiya hakewa mekahuni. 'Anake pepeyemie, 'ikayatsie pe'enuku'ikaripieme, mana pepekahuni. Hiki miki yapetayini kepemitiyurieni. [cite: 3177]
Xuti mipai katinita'eiya: [cite: 3178] -Yanepitiyurieni naime kepeminerahiawe. [cite: 3179]
Heyaka mirati'uximayatsiwatsie yapitikatia mu'eya kemitita'aitiakai. [cite: 3180]

Wuhutsi tiukwaka meta tiu'ieka, puyutemawiekai. Hiki kaneyani hekahunike tsewara matixeirie warita. Hiki Xuti 'arikeke 'aniari 'umieti kanaye'ani hetsiana, 'ikayatia 'enuku'ikaripieka mana kaniukahuni. [cite: 3181, 3182]
Hiki Wuhutsi tikari hixiapa kananutaniere, [cite: 3186] ta'aurie hawenike, 'ana 'ukaratsi puxei manuka'ikatsie 'ukaikame. [cite: 3187, 3189]

Mipai katinita'iwawiya: [cite: 3188] -¿Kepaiki pepiyiane? [cite: 3188] -Ne Xuti nepiyiane, mati'uximayatsiriwame. [cite: 3190] 'A'ikari kitsimeyari keneneukaketia, [cite: 3190] 'eki hiritiarika pepexeiya peminetsitiwitiniki, tatiriyama 'anuiwaritsie miemete memakineki temi'iwamarixiki. [cite: 3190, 3191]

-Neniwe Yawé kematsi'iwiyani. [cite: 3192] hekwameki kepemitiuyuri, pepi'ahekiata kepemitiwiya 'amu'e hetsie, yaxeikiata 'akinatikaitsie temari pemikawakuwauneki, memikatehexeiya yatini memitehexeiya. [cite: 3192]
Hiki neniwe pepikaheumaka. [cite: 3193] Tita pemireuyehiwa naime yanepitiyurieni. Yunaiti neteiterimat yamepitemate 'eki 'ukaratsi 'iniari kepemitihiki yapemitikamieki. [cite: 3194]
'Aixiatsi kani'aneni temi'iwamarixiki perutsi matsi 'akuxi xewiti 'apuyeika kemi'ane mihiritiarie para mimatsiparewieniki. [cite: 3195]

Hiki tikaritsie 'ena keneu'ahayewa ximerike pepiyemie. Xika miki yara'eriwani, 'aixia kani'aneni yaketiuyurieni. [cite: 3196] Peru xika yakara'eriwani yamitiyurieniki, kaniyuritini Yawé mayeniereki, yuriki ne nepiyihiritia nepimatsiparewieni. [cite: 3197, 3198] Keneukaniri mana ximerikeri pekaniyemieni. [cite: 3199]
Hiki manuka'ikatsie 'ukaiti kaniukatariyarieni, tuxakita 'anukukeka kaneyani, mipai mirehiawekaiki: «Xewiti mikaretimaniki kename 'ukaratsi 'ena hekuyeixia mirati'uritiretsie». [cite: 3207]

Hikita Wuhutsi mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3208] -'Axikuri keneutawera, 'aixia ketinewiyani. [cite: 3208] Xuti mipai katiniuyurieni, kanitawera yuxikuri. Mana kanikayatsirieni tsewara xeitewiyari kiruyari. [cite: 3208]

'Itititiaku kiekaritsie kaneyani. [cite: 3209] Hiki kepauka Xuti meta'a yumu'e hetsia, kanita'iwawiya: [cite: 3210] -Keperepariyarie, neniwe [cite: 3211] Xuti naime pititaxatia, tewi hetsiena mieme kemireyuri, [cite: 3212]
mipaita kaniutayini: [cite: 3213] -'Iki tsewara pinetsihetitia xeitewiyari kiruyari, mipai nerahiaweti: "Aixia pika'ane pe'amaweti pemeumieni 'amu'e hetsia". [cite: 3214]
Hiki Nuhemi mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3215] -Neuxei neniwe, 'akuxi keneta'ikwewani ketiyini. Miki tewi yumexiitiati pikatihayewa, 'aixia tiyurienike hiki tukariyaritsie. [cite: 3215]

Hiki Wuhutsi heyaka, kiekari kitenie kanayerini. Mana puyetia 'iwaya mihiritiariekai hetsiena mieme miraxaxatakai. Wuhutsi mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3218, 3219, 3220] -Kenaye'a ne'iwa, 'ena kenayexi. [cite: 3220] Miki tewi mana 'uyaka mana kanayerini. [cite: 3221]

Hiki Wuhutsi 'ukirawetsixi tamamata kiekariyaritsie katiniwaruta'inieni mipaita katiniwarutahiawe: [cite: 3226, 3227, 3228, 3229, 3230, 3231, 3232] -'Ena xekenayaxi. [cite: 3233] Miki mana mekanayaxe. [cite: 3234]

Wuhutsi yu'iwa mihiritiarie mipai katinitahiawe: [cite: 3235, 3236, 3237] -Nuhemi, Muhawi kwieyaritsie heyeyaka, kwie ta'iwa miku'eiri 'Erimereki kanituamikini. [cite: 3238] 4 Mipai netimaiti kename heuyewetse, nematitaxatianiki 'iki hepaitsita, nemetsi'aitiati peminaneniki, 'iki yunaime wahixie 'ukirawetsixi kiekari, meta hipame wahixie. [cite: 3238] Xika 'iki kwie penanaimiki, yaketineuyuri. Mexika 'eki yapekatikayeimiki 'iki kwie hepaitsita, yakeneutayiki, mipai ne nemitimaikaki. [cite: 3239] Xewiti tawariri pumawe heitserie mexeiya piinieya mayaniki, 'eki xeikia. Neta 'a'utima heitserie nepexeiya. [cite: 3240] Miki kanita'eiya: [cite: 3241] -Ne nepiyianeni nemirayukatuani. [cite: 3242]

Matsi Wuhutsi naime katinitahekiatiani: [cite: 3243] -Kepauka Nuhemi kwieya 'apiini pemayeitiani, 'anata Xuti pepitanaki'erieni Muhawi tewiyari, wiura ta'iwa miku'eiri mikwieyatikai, para temikahetitimaiyaniki kename ta'iwa tipinieyatikai miki kwie. [cite: 3243]

'Iwaya mipai kaniutayini: [cite: 3244] -Kamitsi nepikayiwe mipai nemitiyurieniki. Xika mipai netiuyurieni, nepiinite naime nepireuyehiani tita nemirexeiya neniwema wahetsiemieme. 'Ekitsiari katini'ahetsietini, ne mipai nemitiuyurieni. Nepikayiwe. [cite: 3245]

Hiki 'ana tukaritsie 'ixaheritsixi mipai mekateniuhukaitini, kepauka yupiini yukwie 'uku'eirieme tawarita minaneniki, yatini hekwameki minaneniki, 'ana tinaweme yukakai xeitapamieme mepiyukukweitiwakai, mipai mitimatsiikiniki kename 'ana 'inanai. [cite: 3249, 3250]
'Ayumieme 'iwaya mihiritiariekai kwie hepaitsita mipai yu'iwa Wuhutsi katiniutahiawe: [cite: 3251] -'Eki keneunanai. [cite: 3251] Yukakai panuyehinaxi. [cite: 3252]

Hiki Wuhutsi mipai kaniutayini 'ukirawetsixi yunaime kiekatari wahixie, mipai 'utaiti: [cite: 3253] -'Iki tukaritsie xeme xepihiki xemunenierixi, kename Nuhemi netiunanairi naime 'Erimereki tita mitipinieyatikai, Kirihuni meta Makiruni, [cite: 3254]

hikiri mipai xepitemaika kename ne'itiwiti Xuti Muhawi tewiyari Makiruni mi'iyayatikai, mikaheuyewautseniki Makiruni ta'iwa kemitihikitikai, yaxeikiata piiniteya, xemikahetitimaiyaniki yunaiti 'iwamama, yaxeikiata kiekariyaritsie mikaheuyewautseniki kemititewakai. [cite: 3255] Xemeri hiki xemunenierixi xepihiki. [cite: 3256]

'Ukirawetsixi meta yunaiti mana kiekari kitenie memukutekai, mipai mekaniutiyuani: [cite: 3257] -Tame temunenierixi tepihiki. [cite: 3257] >>Yawé yaxeikia yaketiuyurieni miki 'ukaratsi pemitiwitini hetsiemieme, kemitiwaruparewi Xakeri meta Reya nuiwari memukama wahepai, 'ixaheritsixi teiteriyari kememite'aki. [cite: 3258] >>'Ekita pematsiikiti peke'ayani 'Epirata mitiyetewatsie, meta waikawa pemariwati peke'ayani Wereni kiekariyaritsie. [cite: 3259]
Yawé 'iki 'uka hetsie kematsiyetuirieni 'anuiwarima Paretsi nuiwarimama hepai me'anekame, Tamaxi nu'aya Kura hetsiemieme meyexei». [cite: 3262, 3263]
Hiki Wuhutsi Xuti kaniutiwitini. Kepauka memuyutiwiti, Yawé piwarupitia nunutsi memayexeiyaki, hiki 'utihukataka 'ukitime kaniutiniweni. [cite: 3267, 3268, 3269, 3270]
'Ukarawetsixi mekatenikihiawekaitini: «Yawé 'aixia ketikuxaxatsiwani, 'axaitame xeime matsiparewiwame pemexeiyaki. Xeime mayexeiyaki 'Ixaheri manukuhanaki. [cite: 3274]
'Iki nunutsiki 'aixia pepi'itiarieka waikawa, hetsiena petiwiyati, 'amu'e mutiniwexiki. 'Amu'e waikawa mimatsinaki'erie, matsi ke'aniwema me'atahutati». [cite: 3275]
Nuhemi nunutsi kananutuni, kaneikukweni, kaniyihiritiani mitaweriyaki. [cite: 3276]
'Ahurawatari mipai mekaniutiyuanekaitini: <<Nuhemi nunutsi kanexeiyani». 'Uweri mekateniteriwa. 'Iki 'Itsahi paapaya kanayani, Rawiri paa- paya. [cite: 3277]
'Iki Paretsi pinuiwarieya: [cite: 3278] Paretsi, Ketsiruni pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3279]
Ketsiruni, Xami pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3279] Xami, 'Aminarawi pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3279]
'Aminarawi, Nahatsuni pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3279] Nahatsuni, Tsarimuni pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3279]
Tsarimuni, Wuhutsi pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3280]
Wuhutsi, 'Uweri pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3283] 'Uweri, 'Itsahi pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3283] 'Itsahi, Rawiri pipaapayatikai. [cite: 3283]
